CustomField.description: BM 1/2/13 - Created for Services SFDC Interfaces Project. This field holds the date and time when the record was modified in an external source. It will only have a value if the data originates outside of SFDC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field holds the date and time when the record was modified in an external source. It will only have a value if the data originates outside of SFDC.
CustomField.label: Source Modified Date
